radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar dependent atelectasis in lung bases; dilated fluid-filled appendix measuring 10 mm with hyperemic wall and extensive periappendiceal fat stranding; associated wall thickening of the base of the cecum; multiple focal hepatic hypodensities likely representing cysts; unremarkable liver, spleen, pancreas, adrenal glands, and kidneys; normal imaged small and large bowel loops; a small hiatal hernia; numerous diverticula within sigmoid colon without inflammatory changes; no free air or free fluid in abdomen or pelvis.
